Text: Press Releasethomas PST You are receiving this email because you have registered for the International Power email press release distribution service January International Power Receives Final Dividend Payment From Hubco International Power today received from The Hub Power Company Hubco GBP million as final dividend for the year ended June This is the second dividend paid by Hubco following the resolution of its dispute with Pakistans Water and Power Development Authority WAPDA The timely payment of this dividend demonstrates WAPDAs commitment to Hubco and also indicates that dividend payments from Hubco can now be expected as normal course of business said Peter Giller International Powers Chief Executive Officer Notes to the Editors International Power has a equity interest in Hubco An interim dividend for the year ended June was paid to shareholders in December which was the first dividend paid to Hubco shareholders following the settlement of a tariff dispute that caused the suspension of all dividend payments for a threeyear period beginning in For further information Media contact Aarti Singhal Investor contact Grant Jones To unsubscribe please go to unsubscribehtm
